product.name: Frumble
product.description: The humble frumble. A fruit originally grown on TASIT-9. Sought after for its sharp flavor and toxic aroma. Pairs fantastically with a Junglovian eel fillet and a side of bufallant milk.

product.name: Kurporpa
product.description: A fruit that is both spicy and tart. It will attempt to digest you while you eat it. Some say this just adds to the flavor complexity. We hope you're up to the challenge.

product.name: Squelp
product.description: "A Squelp a Day Keeps the Slarkeestas at Bay" -Ancient Junglovian Proverb *The Cosmic Bodega will not be held responsible for any Slarkeesta related injuries or deaths related to the sale of our squelps.

product.name: Gadoobagorp
product.description: The gadoobagorp's shell is harder than lemerian alloy steel, but the juicy flesh and intoxicating juices inside have supposedly lead to massive innovations in the metallurgy sector.

product.name: Gorgaricus
product.description: Just smelling the gorgaricus causes one to experience a deeply unsettling feeling of existential dread. Needless to say, it tastes better than it smells.

product.name: Tribbles
product.description: We're not even sure that tribbles are edible, but we welcome you to try. Godspeed moonman.

product.name: Cantaloupe
product.description: Guys listen, this is the sweatiest melon you've ever seen.

product.name: Alien
product.description: There are ethical implications here, but we'd rather not delve too deep into this stuff. We're just a grocery store.

product.name: Ka'urian flour
product.description: Delightful flour hailing from Ka'urian lands. Rich and nutritious.

product.name: Steamed Lurqun Noodles
product.description: Delicious and exotic. These traditional Lurqun noodles are a great side for any dish.

product.name: Molzala Powder
product.description: A spoonful is all you need to spice up your life.
